name: Special Enquiry Detail: Engaged to Kill
summary: Get ready for the sequel to one of the most popular Hidden Object games of 2010! Special Enquiry Detail: Engaged to Kill is on its way. In this exciting and very promising game you will meet two famous detectives Lamonte and Turino and help them solve the crime! Figure out who kills the young brides, explore the crime scenes and interview different people. Try to stop the serial killer before he kills someone again. Huge amount of locations to explore and puzzles to solve will grab you for hours.
